mehemayi machan....methanadi ramuwen pitathata awith hithanna oone....palaweni karane thama mata nam meka sahenna honda nirmanayak....sangithaya lassanata nirmanaya karala thiyenawa....eekata "bhawathu sabba mangalam" gathawa yoda ganimen mata nam gathawata kisima agaurawayak wela thiyenawa kiyala kiyanna amaruyi.deweni karane bari welawath oya sinduwe rupa rachanaya nothibuna nam mokada wenne?ethanadi oya kagahili mokuth thiyenawada?kawadawath enne na.....habayi ada weddi githayakata rupa rachanaya athyawashyayi kiyala mathayak thiyena hinda rupa rachanaya karanawa...meka gana sakachcha karana bahutharaya aththatama kiwwoth bauddha anthawadin pirisak....ee ayata thama therenna buduhamuduruwo deshana kare buddha dharmaya awabodha karaganna kiyana eka....ehema una nam kawadawath bauddhagama pirihimata thiya wanasila yanna....habayi dan thathwaya ane manda?
